Uses of Interface
com.complexible.stardog.api.Query

  • Packages that use Query 
    Package Description
    com.complexible.stardog.api
    Provides the core SNARL (Stardog Native API for the RDF Language) classes and interfaces for programmatic access to the Stardog DBMS.

    • Uses of Query in com.complexible.stardog.api

      Subinterfaces of Query in com.complexible.stardog.api 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  BooleanQuery
      A boolean (ASK) SPARQL query.
      interface  GraphQuery
      A SPARQL graph (describe or construct) query.
      interface  ReadQuery<T>
      A read-only query, ie a select, construct, graph or ask query.
      interface  SelectQuery
      interface  UpdateQuery
      A SPARQL Update query

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Query<T> Query.dataset(org.openrdf.query.Dataset theDataset)
      Specify the dataset this query will be executed against.
